instructions: This is a revised sheet for Advanced Dungeons and Dragons 2nd Edition for both Player Characters and Monsters. The sheet no longer requires +'s in front of numbers except where they already exist. -'s are still needed where applicable. Numerous Skills and Powers sections have been added. As well as Psionics, both versions. Weapons sections have been split to accomadate the introduction of specific modifiers. If in need of assistance or to report a bug, please send a message to https://app.roll20.net/users/877778/SFX and I will be happy to assist you.
